info.title: Woop to Carrier
info.description: First, all informations about Woop API headed to carriers are centralized in this documentation. If you need precisions or have any questions, please contact internal technical team. To use the API, you need to take your access you got during the creation of your account on Woop platform. The current offered version is Version 1.4.0

post.description: Allows receiving quotes requests. If the quote is validated, transmitted informations will be used during the delivery order creation with POST /deliveries.

requestBody.description: Contains necessary informations to create a quote.

201.description: Success code, quotes have been generated. All asked carriers have a quote ID to accept the delivery.

202.description:
Success code, quotes have been generated. All asked carriers have a quote ID to accept the delivery.

[See refusal reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/carrier/branches/english/docs/3.%20Models/Refusal-reasons.md)

400.description: Missing or incorrect elements in body

403.description: The quote can't or no longer be cancelled

post.description: Allows validating a quote and receiving the delivery order. Its response provides additional useful informations for the delivery.

requestBody.description: Contains necessary informations to create a delivery.

201.description: Delivery is accepted, a 'deliveryId' is returned, in addition an array of 'packages' IDs can be returned in case of tracking by package.

205.description:
Delivery is refused after all, possible refusal reasons are described in "reasons". 

[See refusal reasons](https://woop.stoplight.io/docs/carrier/branches/english/docs/3.%20Models/Refusal-reasons.md)

value.comment: After all, i don't take this delivery.

400.description: Missing or incorrect element in body

requestBody.description: Contaisn informations about delivery cancellation reasons.

400.description: Missing or incorrect element in body

infos.description: Free informations about the delivery address

referenceNumber.description: Order reference, number associated with a store.

401.description: You are not allowed to access this element.

put.description: Allows receiving new delivery rating notification.

400.description: Missing or incorrect element in body
Missing or incorrect element in body

get.description: Allows receiving list of pickup points located around given geographic localisation.

address.description: All useful informations about delivery/picking address.
address.title: Address (address)

elevator.description:
Indicates if place has a lift
Default value : FALSE

postalCode.description: Corresponds with associated main place potal code

elevator.description:
Indicates if place has a lift
Default value : FALSE

postalCode.description: Corresponds with associated main place potal code

pickupPointId.description: Pickup point ID. Present if delivery service is "SERVICE_PICKUP_POINT"

interval.title: Date interval (interval)
interval.description: Specifies a date interval with time.

timezone.description: Delivery time zone for the client

package.description: Handling unit at retailers own. Generally used as the whole order products grouped by package.
package.title: Package (package)

references.description: Package internal references if provided by retailer

notation.title: Client rating (notation)
notation.description: Specifies the obtained score from client.

score.title: Score (score)
score.description: Specifies the obtained score during the delivery.

retailer.title: Retailer (retailer)
retailer.description: Specifies the informations used to identify the retailer during the delivery.

price.description: Corresponds to the price of the quote
price.title: Quote price

refusedReason.description: Specifies the possible refusal reasons described in article : "Motifs de refus".
refusedReason.title: Refusal reason (refusedReason)

cancelledReason.description: List of all possible cancellation reason for a delivery
cancelledReason.title: Cancellation reason (cancelledReason)

deliveryService.title: Delivery service (deliveryService)
deliveryService.description: Specifies the different possible delivery services in the platform.

vehicleType.title: Vehicle type (vehicleType)
vehicleType.description: Specifies the vehicle type used during the delivery.

postQuote.description: Necessary informations to create a delivery quote.
postQuote.title: Quote request informations (postQuote)

postDelivery.title: Delivery request (postDelivery)
postDelivery.description: Specifies the informations used to create a delivery.

orderId.description: Unique order ID to be filled by the retailer

referenceNumber.description: Order reference, number associated to a store. Can be equal to orderId.

packages.description: Handling unit at retailers own. Generally used as the whole order products grouped by package.

orderId.description: Unique order ID to be filled by the retailer

referenceNumber.description: Order reference, number associated to a store. Can be equal to orderId.

deliveryCreatedReference.title: Response informations : Creation of a delivery with a reference (deliveryCreatedPackages))
deliveryCreatedReference.description: Informations about delivery creation with reference response

deliveryCreatedPackages.title: Response informations : Creation of a delivery with a package (deliveryCreatedPackages))
deliveryCreatedPackages.description: Informations about delivery creation with a package response

coordinates.description: Specifies the geographic coordinates to use for the creation.
coordinates.title: Geographic coordinates (coordinates)

productPrice.description: Corresponds with products selling price. Filled if delivery is realized with service SERVICE_INSTALL.
productPrice.title: Products selling price (price)

queryKilometricDistance.description: Distance in kilometers of searching radius
queryKilometricDistance.name: kilometricDistance
